医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究表明，情绪敏感性增加与之前感染过 COVID-19 相关先前的 2019 冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 感染如何通过行为免疫标记影响社会情绪功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Increased-emotional-sensitivity-linked-to-previous-COVID-19-infection-new-research-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Increased-emotional-sensitivity-linked-to-previous-COVID-19-infection-new-research-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a26d9b4e-8936-48a9-b13a-26e8185e2bbc Thu, 02 May 2024 08:20:00 -0400 Increased emotional sensitivity linked to previous COVID-19 infection, new research suggests
“违背承诺”：加州赤字可能会阻碍残疾工人的加薪智力和发育障碍人士的家庭表示，州长加文·纽瑟姆(Gavin Newsom)违背了为照顾亲人的工人提高工资的计划，倡导者警告说，如果残疾人服务变得更难获得，可能会提起诉讼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/e28098Breaking-a-promisee28099-California-deficit-could-halt-raises-for-disability-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/e28098Breaking-a-promisee28099-California-deficit-could-halt-raises-for-disability-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d369705-78e3-4569-9658-e2b1f6ccbbfa Thu, 02 May 2024 08:06:10 -0400 ‘Breaking a promise’: California deficit could halt raises for disability workers
调查凸显了人们对防晒和预防皮肤癌的误解奥兰多健康癌症研究所的一项新的全国调查发现，近三分之一 (32%) 的美国人认为晒黑的皮肤能让人看起来更好、更健康，专家表示，这种危险的美容标准可能会导致暴露在阳光下的危险行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Survey-highlights-misconceptions-on-sun-protection-and-skin-cancer-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Survey-highlights-misconceptions-on-sun-protection-and-skin-cancer-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e088862-c34b-431c-94db-179c4499f6f8 Thu, 02 May 2024 07:57:38 -0400 Survey highlights misconceptions on sun protection and skin cancer prevention
过早的手术绝经可能导致肌肉疾病的风险增加肌肉骨骼疼痛是一种普遍的更年期症状，这有助于解释为什么女性通常比男性经历更多的疼痛，尤其是在 50 岁左右。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Premature-surgical-menopause-can-lead-to-increased-risk-of-muscle-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Premature-surgical-menopause-can-lead-to-increased-risk-of-muscle-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6e2573f-2915-498f-9904-49c5c3520a70 Thu, 02 May 2024 07:51:55 -0400 Premature surgical menopause can lead to increased risk of muscle disorders
研究人员揭示了类风湿关节炎患者独特的自身抗体特征类风湿性关节炎 (RA) 患者都有一组独特且多样化的抗体，这些抗体参与了疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Researchers-unveil-unique-autoantibody-profiles-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Researchers-unveil-unique-autoantibody-profiles-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a2ca115-3fda-4453-990c-5454c70ccb73 Thu, 02 May 2024 07:42:27 -0400 Researchers unveil unique autoantibody profiles in rheumatoid arthritis patients

老年男性的高睾酮水平与房颤风险增加相关研究人员调查了较高的内源性睾酮水平是否会增加健康老年男性的心房颤动 (AF) 风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/High-testosterone-levels-in-older-men-linked-with-greater-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/High-testosterone-levels-in-older-men-linked-with-greater-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=befba4fb-2b36-47c6-8b21-a45dc2cdbe5b Thu, 02 May 2024 06:06:00 -0400 High testosterone levels in older men associated with greater risk of atrial fibrillation
